greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of numbers generated by the Nekrasov-Okounkov formula.
comment: Row sums are A000712, alternating sign row sums are zero (except for first row); application of the Nekrasov-Okounkov formula; see A138782.
link: G. C. Greubel, Rows n=0..50 of triangle, flattened
Richard P. Stanley, Some Combinatorial Properties of Hook Lengths, Contents, and Parts of Partitions arXiv:0807.0383 [math.CO], 2009.
mathematica: CoefficientList[#, t] & /@ Table[1/n! Tr[(NumberOfTableaux[#1]^2 Apply[Times, t + Flatten[hooklength[#1]]^2] &) /@ Partitions[n]], {n,0,9}]
with e and f defined as:
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Mar 24 2012
